name: Built-In Tools
summary: You've built tools into your innovation so you can access and use them easily.

name: Explosive Leap
summary: You aim an explosion from your innovation downward to launch yourself into the air.

name: Haphazard Repair
summary: You quickly fix your innovation, at the cost of its stability.

name: No! No! I Created You!
summary: You appeal to your construct companion's bond with its creator to have it break free of a controlling effect.

name: Prototype Companion
summary: You have created a construct companion, and while it might not be an innovation, it serves as a trustworthy minion.

name: Tamper
summary: You tamper with a foe's weapon or armor, using a free hand.

name: Variable Core
summary: You adjust your innovation's core, changing the way it explodes.

name: Collapse Armor
summary: You've modified your armor innovation to collapse into a more compact form so you can don or remove it in an instant.

name: Collapse Construct
summary: You've modified your construct companion and built it out of light materials, enabling you to collapse it into a carrying case or other compact and innocuous form.

name: Reverse Engineer
summary: You are incredibly skilled at reverse engineering items to learn their formulas, or disassembling them just to disable them.

name: Searing Restoration
summary: They told you there was no way that explosions could heal people, but they were fools… Fools who didn't understand your brilliance! You create a minor explosion from your innovation, altering the combustion to cauterize wounds using vaporized medicinal herbs.

name: Advanced Construct Companion
summary: You've upgraded your construct companion's power and decision-making ability.

name: Diving Armor
summary: You've modified your armor with fins, rotors, and other devices to make it easy for you to move through the water, plus mechanical gills that can help you extract breathable air from water.

name: Dual-Form Weapon
summary: You've built your innovation with replaceable interlocking pieces that you can use to transform it into another type of weapon entirely.

name: Gadget Specialist
summary: Rather than just using your gadgets for various boosts and tweaks, you also craft a few specific temporary consumable gadgets each day.

name: Megaton Strike
summary: You activate gears, explosives, and other hidden mechanisms in your innovation to make a powerful attack.

name: Clockwork Celerity
summary: You can use unstable clockwork devices in your innovation to push your invention to act more quickly.

name: Construct Shell
summary: You've adjusted your construct innovation so that when you ride it, special plates, hollows, or similar form partial barriers around you to add additional protection.

name: Megavolt
summary: You bleed off some electric power from your innovation in the shape of a damaging bolt.

name: Visual Fidelity
summary: You've found a way to use a hodgepodge combination of devices to enhance your visual abilities in every situation.

name: Gigaton Strike
summary: When you use a full-power Megaton Strike, you can knock your foe back.

name: Incredible Construct Companion
summary: Thanks to your continual tinkering, your construct companion has advanced to an astounding new stage of engineering, enhancing all its attributes.

name: Manifold Modifications
summary: You've modified your innovation using clever workarounds, so you can include another initial modification without compromising its structure.

name: Overdrive Ally
summary: You quickly fling some of your powered-up mechanisms to an ally, sharing your benefits with them briefly.

name: Ubiquitous Gadgets
summary: They thought you had used up all your devices, but they thought wrong! You have a few more gadgets up your sleeve than others expect.

name: Distracting Explosion
summary: Your enemies think they can concentrate on something else while you're nearby? Oh, you'll give them a distraction, all right!

name: Electrify Armor
summary: You electrify your armor to punish foes who dare to attack you.

name: Helpful Tinkering
summary: You don't just tinker with your own innovation, you fiddle with your allies' weapons as well (for their benefit, of course).

name: Lock On
summary: Aha! You lock on to your enemy's weak point to assist your construct companion in destroying it.

name: Boost Modulation
summary: You aren't satisfied with keeping to just one kind of boost from your constant tinkering, so you've learned to modulate between several possibilities at once.

name: Contingency Gadgets
summary: You are too brilliant to be caught off guard, and you always have just the right gadget for the situation.

name: Deep Freeze
summary: You vent a jet of supercooled fluid from your innovation, damaging a foe and slowing it down.

name: Gigavolt
summary: When you unleash electricity from your innovation, you can bounce it off obstacles, creating a field of electric death.

name: Shared Overdrive
summary: You've experimented enough on your teammates to transfer a substantial number of powered-up gizmos to them, enabling one of your allies to benefit from the full effects and duration of your Overdrive.

name: Explosive Maneuver
summary: Thanks to a hidden experimental feature you built into your weapon, your weapon explosively deploys levers, tangling hooks, or similar mechanisms to provide significant assistance when you perform a combat maneuver.

name: Paragon Companion
summary: Your construct companion has reached the pinnacle of form and function.

name: Soaring Armor
summary: You've managed to free your innovation from the bonds of gravity!

name: Unstable Redundancies
summary: You've built triple redundancies into your innovation and added all sorts of buffers to protect it from the harm of your unstable experiments.

name: Just the Thing!
summary: Need to balance on a razor's edge, force open an iron door, or persuade a dragon to negotiate? Never fear! No matter the situation, you always have just the thing.

name: Persistent Boost
summary: Your innovation sets foes on fire, covers them in acid, leaves barbed thorns behind, or otherwise deals persistent damage to your foes that sticks around long after you deliver your boosted attack.

name: You Failed to Account for… This!
summary: When your foes try to attack you, you always seem to have some outlandish invention you can pull out at the last second to protect you from whatever attack they throw at you.

name: Devastating Weaponry
summary: You release a volley of projectiles from your weapon, or power it to fly in every direction across the battlefield and Strike multiple creatures.

name: Engine of Destruction
summary: Your construct unleashes a broad swath of devastation by separating its limbs, deploying hidden armaments, or using a similar technique to wreak havoc.

name: Negate Damage
summary: Your armor innovation activates various devices you prepared ahead of time, and you use one of them to reduce the damage you would take by 15.

name: Full Automation
summary: You become so entwined with your innovations that you can use them without a second thought.

name: Ubiquitous Overdrive
summary: You prepare a variety of incredible gizmos on each of your allies, linking them together through careful modification to enable you to power them up all at once.
